summary_md: Latvia, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 16,951 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 1.27% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 6.72% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 75.68 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 92.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 64.62% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Latvia's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 16,951 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and an export growth rate of 64.62% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Latvia shows an unemployment rate of 6.72% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating the general employment situation.
sections.digital_md: Internet penetration in Latvia is relatively high, with usage at 92.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), reflecting the country's digital infrastructure.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Latvia is 75.68 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), suggesting the overall health environment.
